attributes.action: Allow Festivals To Offer Drug Tests.
attributes.additional_details:
The illegality of recreational drugs and subsequent lack of regulation in the market leads to substances being cut and mixed with dangerous or poisonous knock-offs. 

While it doesn't look like this government will legalize or decriminalize drugs, it is hoped that they will take this measure to enable people to make informed personal choices.
attributes.background:
More than 3,300 people died from drug poisoning in 2014 - The highest number since records began. This could be alleviated if festivals could offer tests to identify the purity and content of festival-goers pills and other substances.

Clear and simple legislation should be written to allow this.
